headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Index Tumbles as Economic Concerns Intensify
summary: The S&P 500 dropped 2.7% on Monday, March 10, as U.S. tariffs and government job cuts heightened economic uncertainty and provoked recession concerns.
